entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Black Border 2
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 0,49¬†‚Ç¨ [0,49¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 1,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö0,49¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

J√° imaginou como √© estar na linha da frente da seguran√ßa nacional? Em Black Border 2, voc√™ assume o papel de um agente da Pol√≠cia de Fronteira, enfrentando situa√ß√µes desafiantes a cada turno. Com visuais detalhados e jogabilidade envolvente, este jogo oferece uma experi√™ncia realista incompar√°vel que coloca voc√™ no centro da a√ß√£o. Assuma a responsabilidade de proteger as fronteiras do seu pa√≠s contra o contrabando ilegal. Inspecione ve√≠culos, reveja documentos e enfrente contrabandistas que tentam traficar drogas, armas e outras mercadorias ilegais. Cada dia traz novos desafios, onde pensamento r√°pido e vis√£o agu√ßada s√£o as suas melhores ferramentas. Voc√™ √© mais do que um simples agente de fronteira ‚Äî voc√™ √© a √∫ltima linha de defesa. Funcionalidades de Black Border 2: Simula√ß√£o aut√™ntica de patrulha de fronteira: Coloque-se no papel de um verdadeiro agente, onde cada decis√£o conta e cada intera√ß√£o est√° carregada de tens√£o. Inspe√ß√£o detalhada de documentos: Analise cuidadosamente passaportes, autoriza√ß√µes e outros documentos para decidir quem pode entrar e quem deve ser barrado. Dete√ß√£o de contrabando: Realize buscas minuciosas em ve√≠culos e inspe√ß√µes pessoais para capturar criminosos que tentam contrabandear mercadorias ilegais. Personagens din√¢micos com IA: Interaja com personagens realistas que reagem e se adaptam com base nas suas decis√µes e a√ß√µes. Desafios crescentes: Desde pequenos erros em documentos at√© grandes redes de contrabando, enfrente miss√µes cada vez mais intensas que v√£o testar os seus limites.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.content:
Discount Information

  • Raider Mk. 3Ôºö34,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 9,99¬†‚Ç¨ [9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 34,99¬†‚Ç¨]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöGratuito

Compras integradas

  • Raider Mk. 1Ôºö5,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Raider Mk. 2Ôºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Raider Mk. 3Ôºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨
  • Raider WeeklyÔºö1,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

All in one app for an Interactive Map, Loot locations, Material list and breakdown list, Enemy drop list, guides and quest-line guides. - Interactive Maps - Sort and Filter - Event Timers and Notifications - Guides for Quests Guides and Maps are partially available for free, but a Pro membership is required to access all content Raiders Map is the best tool for easy access to everything, along with world class support. You can reach me directly on X for help or to report any issues: All4nDev, or through discord. Not affiliated with embark. Raiders Map is independently owned and managed. apple standard EULA https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

entry.title: Wood Screw Pin Jam Puzzle
entry.content:
Discount Information

Compras integradas

  • VIP versionÔºö3,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 2,99¬†‚Ç¨ [2,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 3,99¬†‚Ç¨]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨

Compras integradas

  • VIP versionÔºö2,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Unscrew, twist, and solve tricky puzzles in Wood Screw Pin Jam Puzzle. Use your logic to pull out pins, move wooden pieces, and free the jammed boards. Every level is a new challenge that tests your brain and creativity. Enjoy hundreds of handcrafted stages designed to train your problem-solving skills. Play at your own pace ‚Äî no timer, no pressure, just satisfying gameplay and relaxing sound effects. Whether you are a casual player or a puzzle master, this game brings endless fun with realistic 3D wood visuals and smooth mechanics. Game Features: Smart logic puzzles and brain-training challenges Twist, unscrew, and pull pins to solve unique jams Realistic wooden design and 3D effects Hundreds of relaxing yet challenging levels Play anytime, works offline Simple controls and addictive gameplay Relax, think, and twist your way to victory. Download Wood Screw Pin Jam Puzzle and enjoy the most satisfying wooden puzzle experience.

Application Description

Finalmente, o premiado slash-'em-up da Heart Machine chega ao iOS na sua vers√£o mais polida e refinada de sempre, a Special Edition. ‚ñ∫ Vencedor dos pr√©mios "Audience Award" e "Excellence in Visual Art" do prestigiado Independent Games Festival. ‚ñ∫ Mais de 14 nomea√ß√µes nas categorias Melhor Design Visual, Melhor √Åudio e Melhor Jogo Original. ‚ñ∫ 9/10 Destructoid ¬´¬†Um exemplo de excel√™ncia. Podem existir falhas, mas s√£o insignificantes e n√£o causam granes estragos.¬†¬ª ‚ñ∫ 9,5/10 Game Informer ¬´¬†A combina√ß√£o da banda sonora, dos gr√°ficos e dos combates cria um ambiente complexo que vale a pena explorar.¬†¬ª ‚ñ∫ Recomendado pela Eurogamer ¬´¬†O slash-'em-up da Heart Machine √© esgotante e preciso - e incrivelmente belo.¬†¬ª ‚ñ∫ 9/10 GameSpot ¬´¬†√â mais do que simplesmente bonito; o Hyper Light Drifter usa os seus gr√°ficos para te guiar e relaxar. As paisagens magn√≠ficas desaceleram a pulsa√ß√£o entre sequ√™ncias de combate dif√≠ceis, que te deixam sem f√¥lego.¬†¬ª ‚ñ∫ 8,5 Polygon ¬´¬†O Hyper Light Drifter combina habilmente momentos contemplativos com a√ß√£o vertiginosa.¬†¬ª ‚ñ∫ 5 Estrelas Darkstation ¬´¬†O RPG de a√ß√£o, visto de cima, Hyper Light Drifter √© um jogo espantoso: lindo, um mundo fascinante para explorar, controlos sem falhas, m√∫sica magn√≠fica e a confian√ßa no jogador que o far√° descobrir as coisas sozinho.¬†¬ª Os ecos de um passado sombrio e violento ressoam atrav√©s das terras selvagens, repletas de tesouros e sangue. Os Drifters deste mundo s√£o os colecionadores de conhecimentos esquecidos, tecnologias perdidas e hist√≥rias desfeitas. O nosso Drifter √© assombrado por uma doen√ßa insaci√°vel, viajando pelas terras do Tempo Sepultado, na esperan√ßa de descobrir uma forma de apaziguar a doen√ßa cruel. Hyper Light Drifter √© um RPG de a√ß√£o/aventura ao estilo dos melhores cl√°ssicos de 16 bits, com mec√¢nicas modernizadas e gr√°ficos numa escala grandiosamente superior. Explora um vasto mundo deslumbrante e em ru√≠nas, repleto de perigos e tecnologias esquecidas. entry.title: Jump Desktop (RDP, VNC, Fluid)
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö17,99¬†‚Ç¨ ‚Üí 9,99¬†‚Ç¨ [9,99¬†‚Ç¨ ~ 17,99¬†‚Ç¨]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö9,99¬†‚Ç¨

Application Description

Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere. Jump Desktop is a remote desktop application that lets you securely connect to any computer in the world. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. Jump Desktop also supports our own, high performance, next generation remote desktop protocol called Fluid Remote Desktop. Easy setup and reliable: Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‚ÄòAutomatic Setup‚Äô link and follow step-by-step instructions. You‚Äôll be up and running in no time. Also - not subscriptions! Secure: Jump encrypts the connection between computers to ensure privacy and security. Automatic connections are always encrypted by default. Supports NLA, TLS/SSL encryption for RDP. SSH Tunnelling and SSL/TLS encryption for VNC. Fluid Remote Desktop uses DTLS for secure connections. Powerful features: * Works with almost any computer and operating system. * Supports physical mice! On iOS 13 and iPadOS, Jump Desktop supports the accessibility mouse with some limitations. Jump Desktop also supports special physical mice with no limitations. For more information visit https://jumpdesktop.com/mice. * Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop and audio. * Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like ‚Äì there are no limits! * Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod * iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil. * Open multiple simultaneous connections * Live connection previews * Protect your server settings using Touch ID * Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing * Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys) * SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported * Supports large custom screen resolutions and VGA/HDMI out * Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement * Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger * Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard * HDMI/VGA external monitor support: View your desktop on an external monitor using a cable or AirPlay. Jump Desktop will let you utilize you external display as a true monitor (not as a mirror like other apps on the store). * Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet * Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption. RDP features: * Supports RD Gateway * Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions. * Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+ * Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!) * Folder sharing * Audio streaming * Console sessions * International keyboard layouts * Multiple monitor support on Windows 7+ * Multi-touch redirection support on Windows 8+ Fluid Features: * Super high performance, adaptive remote desktop * Audio streaming * Strong encryption built into the protocol * Connect from anywhere, even restricted networks without requiring networking knowledge * Clipboard sharing VNC features: * Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop) * Secure: Supports SSH tunneling as well as SSL encryption * Black & white, gray scale, 8, 16 and 24-bit color to help optimize bandwidth * Multiple monitor support * Macs: Support locking the Mac's screen and syncing the pasteboard

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
